com.gravityrd.recengclient.webshop

Class GravityClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gravityrd.recengclient.webshop.GravityClient

  • public final class GravityClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The GravityClient class can be used to send events, item and user information to the recommendation engine and get recommendations.

    Example usage: 

                    public GravityClient createGravityClient() {
                        GravityClient client = new GravityClient();
                        client.setRemoteUrl("https://saas.gravityrd.com/grrec-CustomerID-war/WebshopServlet");
                        client.setUserName("sampleUser");
                        client.setPassword("samplePasswd");
                        return client;
        }
                GravityClient client = createGravityClient();
                GravityRecommendationContext context = new GravityRecommendationContext();
                context.numberLimit = 1;
                context.scenarioId = "ITEM_PAGE";
                client.getItemRecommendation("user1", context);

      • setRemoteUrl

        public void setRemoteUrl(java.lang.String remoteUrl)
        Set the URL of the server side interface. It has no default value, must be specified.
        Parameters:
        remoteUrl - the server url provided by Gravity integration team

      • getUserName

        public java.lang.String getUserName()

      • setUserName

        public void setUserName(java.lang.String userName)
        Set the user name for the http authenticated connection. Leave it blank in case of connection without authentication.
        Parameters:
        userName - user authentication name provided by Gravity

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set the password for the http authenticated connection. Leave it blank in case of connection without authentication.
        Parameters:
        password - user authentication password provided by Gravity

      • getReadTimeout

        public int getReadTimeout()

      • setReadTimeout

        public void setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
        Set the timeout for the operations in millisecs. The default value is 3000 millisecs.
        Parameters:
        readTimeout - wait up to this millisecond for the request answers

      • addEvents

        public void addEvents(com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityEvent[] events,
                      boolean async)
               throws com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Adds events to the recommendation engine.
        Parameters:
        events - The events to add.
        async - true if the call is asynchronous. An asynchronous call returns immediately after an input data checking, a synchronous call returns only after the data is saved to database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if cannot connect
        com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException - if cannot process the answer files

      • addUsers

        public void addUsers(com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityUser[] users,
                     boolean async)
              throws com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Adds users to the recommendation engine. The existing users will be updated. If a user already exists with the specified userId, the entire user will be replaced with the new user specified here.
        Parameters:
        users - The user to add.
        async - true if the call is asynchronous. An asynchronous call returns immediately after an input data checking, a synchronous call returns only after the data is saved to database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if cannot connect
        com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException - if cannot process the answer files

      • addItems

        public void addItems(com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityItem[] items,
                     boolean async)
              throws com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Adds items to the recommendation engine. If an item already exists with the specified itemId, the entire item along with its NameValue pairs will be replaced to the new item specified here.
        Parameters:
        items - The items to add
        async - true if the call is asynchronous. An asynchronous call returns immediately after an input data checking, a synchronous call returns only after the data is saved to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if cannot connect
        com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException - if cannot process the answer filesdatabase.

      • getItemRecommendation

        public com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityItemRecommendation getItemRecommendation(java.lang.String userId,
                                                                                                java.lang.String cookieId,
                                                                                                com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecommendationContext context)
                                                                                         throws com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException,
                                                                                                java.io.IOException
        Returns a list of recommended items, based on the given context parameters.
        Parameters:
        userId - The identifier of the logged in user. If no user is logged in, null should be specified.
        cookieId - It should be a permanent identifier for the end users computer, preserving its value across browser sessions. It should be always specified.
        context - Additional information which describes the actual scenario.
        Returns:
        An object containing the recommended items and other information about the recommendation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if cannot connect
        com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException - if cannot process the answer files

      • getItemRecommendationBulk

        public com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityItemRecommendation[] getItemRecommendationBulk(java.lang.String userId,
                                                                                                      java.lang.String cookieId,
                                                                                                      com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecommendationContext[] context)
                                                                                               throws com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException,
                                                                                                      java.io.IOException
        Given the userId and the cookieId, we can request recommendations for multiple scenarios (described by the context). This function returns lists of recommended items for each of the given scenarios in an array.
        Parameters:
        userId - The identifier of the logged in user. If no user is logged in, null should be specified.
        cookieId - It should be a permanent identifier for the end users computer, preserving its value across browser sessions. It should be always specified.
        context - Additional Array of information which describes the actual scenarios.
        Returns:
        An Array containing the recommended items for each scenario with other information about the recommendation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if cannot connect
        com.gravityrd.receng.web.webshop.jsondto.GravityRecEngException - if cannot process the answer files
